page.title: 131ST HARVINGTON BROWNIE PACK
page.content:
The pack meets every Wednesday during the school term at the Baptist Chapel in Harvington. There are up to 24 girls aged between 7 and 11, and two adult Guiders,Brown Owl and Tawny Owl. Once every month the pack goes swimming in Evesham.The girls leave at 10 or 11 to join the local Guide Unit.
The children taking part in this Domesday Survey from Salford Priors Primary School were: J.Johnson Z.Pinfold J.Easthope C.Houghton K.Worrall B.Boxall D.Woodhouse I.Bomford S.Clarke G.Anderson and teachers A.Holloway S.Nardini C.Mean L.Jones Mrs.A.Alder M.Bishop J.Norledge A.King T.Gould Mrs.L.Anderson H.Davies M.Morrison S.Harrison N.Robinson
